2.text: Set aside 4 tablespoons (1/4 cup) of the melted butter in a bowl.

3.vid: /c/c6/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Allow the mixture to heat to a bubble.
4.vid: /f/f8/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Distribute the cinnamon molasses in a mini doughnut pan.
5.vid: /d/d6/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Add the milk and egg to the reserved melted butter.
6.vid: /3/3e/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: In a medium bowl, combine the rest of the ingredients together.
7.vid: /a/ab/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Add the milk butter mixture into the bowl.
8.vid: /7/74/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 8.360p.mp4

12.text: Transfer the doughnuts to a wire cooling rack.

13.vid: /7/75/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 13.360p.mp4

14.text: Dip the doughnuts into the frosting.
14.vid: /d/db/Make Mini Cinnamon Roll Baked Doughnuts Step 14.360p.mp4
